name: Marcin Kmiec
body:
### About me

![](http://s.gravatar.com/avatar/70cd3a418cc326d5bf772d2148879cdf?s=200)

I am a iOS Developer and **Consultant** based in Poland with over five year C/C++ development experience, including two year of Objective-C development for the iOS platform specifically. I have published a number of my own apps, including [Hacker News Client](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/hacker-news-client/id939454231?mt=8&ign-mpt=uo%3D4) which has been growing like crazy (quote from Crashlytics) nearly topping the AppStore Charts in its highly competitive category. 
 
### Open Source Contributions 

I have also been an active member in the iOS open source community with my Hacker News Client ending up on the [list](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_free_and_open-source_iOS_applications#News) of notable open-source iOS apps and gaining significant attention on GitHub.

### Blog

I maintain a blog on iOS Development. You can find it on [medium.com](https://medium.com/@Bonzoq). 

### Contact

If you'd like to get intouch for any reason please email bonzoq@gmail.com.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
